basics.name: Julien Levasseur
basics.label: Automatisation, Orchestration, Continuous Integration and Delivery Evangelist.

highlights: Participate in the DevOps team formation.

work.position: Automation Specialist, Infrastructure as Code expert for Desjardins
highlights: Conduct of a proof of concept: Infrastructure as Code (Terraform).
Contribution to the ATM/Counter modernization: cookbooks optimization and evolution (Chef), application packages creation (Jenkins, Maven, Chef, Artifactory).
Deployment of a complete automation stack.
Infrastructure as Code (Terraform + custom python REST API)
Configuration Management (Chef + Consul)
Runbook & Jobs Automation (Rundeck + Terraform provisioners)
Monitoring Automation (Filebeat + Metricbeat + ES + Kibana + Zabbix)
Chef cookbooks development.
Exploitation et improvement of provisionning system (Ansible).
System referent for the Dev team.
Deployment of a Zabbix monitoring infrastructure
Deployment of infrastructures solutions for 'Online' projects (web, multiplayer) on CentOS.
Deployment of projects infrastructure such as Rainbow 6 Siege, For Honor ...
Chef cookbooks creation and optimizations.
Contribution in automation stack development (OpenStack, Azure, AWS ...).
Development of ARTIC (Automatic Real-Time Incident Creator), a program to generate ServiceNow Incidents from Zabbix alerts.
Development of Torii , a RESTFUL API as single access point to deal with cloud.
Active participation to the deployment of processes to automate the configuration management via Chef.
Contribution in developemnt (Python) of Nagano orchestrator.
Deployment of infrastructures solutions for 'Online' projects (web, multiplayer) on CentOS (99%) and Debian.
Mercury (standardization of payment platforms) project's infrastructure establishment, system referent to dev teams and training of operational administrator in Bucharest.
WebServices project's dedicated administrator (for a year), junction point between WebServices dev team and IT teams.
Development of Leatherman (A pocket survival tool for admins (Python)) to make easier linux admin life and encourage utilization of Jira, ServiceNow, Zabbix and Chef.
Driving projects (subsidiary website, web games, information websites ...).
System referent for Kanopya development (Cloud management system).
KVM and OpenNebula integration into Kanopya project.
Compilation of virtualization optimized Linux kernels for Debian Squeeze.
Integration of Cisco UCS and NetApp APIs in the Kanopya's backend.
Development of Kanopya's webui (JQuery).
Unix/Linux Consultant
Servers administration Solaris (90%) and RHEL (10%)
Interlocutor with developpers, project managers and admins to standardize integration and deployment processes.
MySQL high availability project driven for www.wsop.fr website.
Documentation, processes and methods redaction.
Mandates achievement for Sun Microsystems Canada as Sun Solaris and Sun Storedge consultant.
Sun Microsystem servers installation under Solaris 10.
SAN Storedge arrays installation.
Development (Java) of a graphical interface to selecting Remote Desktop servers from Sunrays thin clients.

work.summary: 1rst year of Technicien Supérieur Administrateur Systèmes, sandwich course
highlights: Corporate network administration.
Execution of assignments from clients.
